but I would n't wan na live there .

Went there and had a combination of different seafood dishes and appetizers .
also make sure you pay attention to the music being piped in , quite a weird selection .
they did n't disappoint , service from the second i arrived at the door was extremely pleasant and attentive with almost one server per table .

Suan has challenged this loyalty .
While we thoroughly enjoyed the food , it was annoying to scream across the table for conversation .
Guacamole+shrimp appetizer was really great , we both had the filet , very good , did n't much like the frites that came with , but the filet was so good , neither of us cared .
Stay away from the two specialty rolls on the menu , though too much avocado and rice will fill you up right quick .
I stumbled upon this great pizzeria as I explored my new neighborhood .
They charge $ 600 for rice .
The steak is good , the fish is good and the sushi was surprisingly great .
Sushi was n't anything spectacular for the price .
Having not been home in the last 2 years may skew this reviewer a bit , but the food was tasty and spicy sans the oil that comes floating along at similar venues .
The service is excellent , the decor is great , and the food is delicious and comes in large portions .

On the other hand , if you are not fooled easily , you will find hundreds of restaurants that will give you service and ambiance that is on par with Alain Ducasse , and food that will outshine in presentaion , taste , choice , quality and quantity .
